Metadata.Title: Unused Ports Are Blocked by Default
Metadata.DirectLink: Unused Ports Are Blocked by Default
Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan

Content.Data:
What to Check For

Check to ensure that unused ports are blocked by default when configuring your network firewall.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
